name: Puzzle & Dragons Z + Super Mario Bros. Edition
name_original: Puzzle & Dragons Z + Super Mario Bros. Edition
description:
Puzzle & Dragons Z + Super Mario Bros. Edition is a puzzle game developed by GungHo Online Entertainment. It was originally released in 2015. Nintendo published the game. Puzzle & Dragons Z + Super Mario Bros. Edition has a Metascore of 73, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Puzzle & Dragons Z + Super Mario Bros. Edition on Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Daisuke Yamamoto. Naoki Fukuda, Takayuki Takahara and Yoshimasa Yamada directed the game. It was scored by Keigo Ozaki, Kenji Ito, Toshiko Tasaki and Yukio Nakajima.
